pullRequest.title: Feature - Potion Effects
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
This PR aims to add potion effects to Skript, allowing for:

Getting potion effects on an entity/item
clearing potion effects on an entity/item
adding potion effects to an entity/item
creating custom potion effects to add to entities/items

NOTE:


So Bukkit does not have any API for getting a "potion effect" from a potion item (ie: base potion items in creative mode), therefor I created a class, which I manually added all the durations and amplifiers directly from Minecraft. This helps convert PotionData -> PotionEffects
1a) Bukkit does not account for TurtleMaster having 2 different effects, so I had to create a little method to return both of those.


This one drives me bonkers. For some reason Skript is returning a potion effect type as a CB class CraftPotionEffectType which is fine. No issue there, but for some reason, when manually using a PotionEffectType in the code and/or grabbing it from the data, it returns as a Bukkit class PotionEffectTypeWrapper and to make things weirder, Skript will not compare these. Due to that I threw in a bandaid, I dont like it, but it works.  If anyone has a suggestion to making this nicer/cleaner PLEASE let me know. Cause this bandaid is stupid.



Target Minecraft Versions: any
Requirements: none
Related Issues: #1458

commit.message: PotionEffects - bringing potion effects to Skript
BukkitClasses - usage -> user for Potion effects (whoops)
PotionEffectUtils - some fixes and some stupid bandaid

nodes.bodyText:
Maybe EffPotion should also (or instead) take in PotionEffects?
With this, you kind of have two systems that IMO need to be brought together somehow.

Could this take in PotionEffectTypes as well? e.g.
add swiftness to potion effects of player

where this would add swiftness 1 with default time

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            	 * @param entity Entity to add effects
          
          
            
            	 * @param entity Entity to add effects to
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -189,4 +226,100 @@ public static String getPotionName(@Nullable PotionEffectType effect, boolean ex
 		
 		return s;
 	}
+	
+	/**
+	 * Clear all the active {@link PotionEffect PotionEffects} from an Entity
+	 *
+	 * @param entity Entity to clear effects for
+	 */
+	public static void clearAllEffects(LivingEntity entity) {
+		entity.getActivePotionEffects().forEach(potionEffect -> entity.removePotionEffect(potionEffect.getType()));
+	}
+	
+	/**
+	 * Add PotionEffects to an entity
+	 *
+	 * @param entity Entity to add effects

commit.message: ExprPotionEffects - add support for adding potion effect types
EffPotion - add support for potion effects

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/feature/active-potion-effects' into feature/active-potion-effects
